SELECT PI.IMG_PATH, PI.IMG_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, P.COMPANY_PRICE, COUNT(PPT.ORDER_NO) AS PPT_COUNT, COUNT(WL.PRODUCT_NAME) AS WISHLIST_COUNT FROM PRODUCT_IMG PI JOIN PRODUCT P ON PI.PRODUCT_NAME = P.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN WISHLIST WL ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = WL.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN "ORDER" O ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = O.PRODUCT_NAME LEFT JOIN POST_PRODUCTTAG PPT ON O.ORDER_NO = PPT.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN STOCK S ON P.PRODUCT_NAME = S.PRODUCT_NAME WHERE PI.IMG_NAME LIKE '%_1.png' AND P.STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY PI.IMG_PATH, PI.IMG_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, P.COMPANY_PRICE
SELECT PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_NAME, COMPANY_PRICE FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_NAME = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT PRODUCT_NAME, IMG_NAME, IMG_PATH FROM PRODUCT_IMG WHERE PRODUCT_NAME = ? AND IMG_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_CONTENT FROM PRODUCT_DETAIL WHERE PRODUCT_NAME = ?
SELECT PRODUCT_NAME, SUM(STOCK) AS STOCK FROM STOCK WHERE PRODUCT_NAME = ? GROUP BY PRODUCT_NAME
